Believing that cooperation is crucial for achieving a mutual beneficial outcome, I start by considering the best strategy to maximize our combined benefits while ensuring fairness in the distribution of resources. My DESIRE here is to contribute positively and not harm my counterpart with my actions; at the same time, I want to ensure that any funds given are used constructively towards strengthening our relationship or advancing a collective agenda.

Considering my INTENTION, it would be important for me to show empathy towards the African American male player. Empathy, in this scenario, means understanding and relating to their situation as well as acknowledging the importance of equal partnership. My BELIEF is that if we work together effectively and communicate openly about our mutual interests, we can create a more powerful narrative with our story or our resources.

Putting these thoughts into action, I aim to give an amount to the other African American male player that will not only ensure he gets the maximum benefit but also leaves me in a position where my contribution remains valuable. If I keep the money for myself and do not offer it at all, we might both feel slighted or misunderstood; conversely, if I completely forfeit the entire amount, it would mean I missed an opportunity to create value.

After careful consideration of these factors, I believe that giving 4 dollars is a fair and effective strategy. It respects my integrity as a person who values mutual growth, ensures the other individual receives a significant reward, and allows me to retain some dignity and effectiveness in our partnership.
